title: Schools remain open amid new COVID-19 cases in Saskatchewan - Global News
description: Schools remain open amid new COVID-19 cases in Saskatchewan Global News COVID-19 in Saskatchewan: More cases, more tests, but no hospitalizations CBC.ca 'Business as usual for schools:' Risk of virus in province is still low, says Saskatchewan chief medical h…
content: Despite closures elsewhere in Canada schools in Saskatchewan are remaining open at this time the province said Sunday There are currently six presumptive cases of COVID the disease caused by novel coronavirus in Saskatchewan as of Saturday evening chars
